intro.speaker: Ship AI
intro.text: Navigation protocols loaded. Mission objective: secure 4 waypoint beacons to establish a safe corridor.

beacon-1-locked.speaker: Ship AI
beacon-1-locked.text: Beacon 1 secured. Route segment established. Proceed to Beacon 2.

tutorialTip.title: Navigation Tip
tutorialTip.text: Use right-click to set waypoints. Your ship automatically accelerates and decelerates to hold a beacon.

beacon-2-locked.speaker: Ship AI
beacon-2-locked.text: Beacon 2 secured. Warning: hostile signatures detected ahead. Recommend defensive posture.

encounter-warning.speaker: Ship AI
encounter-warning.text: Deploying tactical overlay. Use missiles to clear obstacles. Remember: light-time delay affects targeting.

tutorialTip.title: Missile Tip
tutorialTip.text: Configure missiles in the right panel. Higher speed reduces lifetime; wider agro radius makes targets easier to detect.

beacon-3-locked.speaker: Ship AI
beacon-3-locked.text: Beacon 3 secured. Final waypoint ahead. Mission completion imminent.

mission-complete.speaker: Ship AI
mission-complete.text: All beacons secured. Navigation corridor established. Mission successful.

mission-failed.speaker: Ship AI
mission-failed.text: Mission failure detected. Reinitialising systems. You may retry from the last checkpoint.
